Name: GATEWAY SPECIAL FACILITY REQUIREMENT COMMENT TEXT
SHORTFALLS PERSONNEL
Explanation: A SHORT DESCRIPTION OF WHY THERE ARE SHORTAGES OF A PARTICULAR PERSONNEL TYPE.

Name: REQUEST DESCRIPTION
Explanation: A BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE REQUEST FOR ASSISTANCE CONTAINED IN A REFERENCED MESSAGE.

Name: MODE 3 COMMENTS
Explanation: AMPLIFYING OR SPECIAL INFORMATION ON MODE 3 DATA FOR THE TRACK BEING REPORTED.

Name: STATUS OF AIRCREW
Explanation: A BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF WHAT HAPPENED TO THE CREW ASSOCIATED WITH A CAPTURED AIRCRAFT.

Name: CIRCUMSTANCES OF CAPTURE
Explanation: GIVES A LITERAL DESCRIPTION OF THE CIRCUMSTANCES SURROUNDING THE CAPTURE OF THE DOCUMENT.

Name: REMARKS
Explanation: ENABLES ADDITIONAL TEXT TO BE ATTACHED TO THE FIELDS IT REFERS TO.

Name: COLUMN ROUTE DETAILS
Explanation: PROVIDES COLUMN/ROUTE DETAILS FOR A ROAD MOVEMENT.

Name: STATUS OF PASSENGERS
Explanation: DESCRIBES IN FREE TEXT THE STATUS OF PASSENGERS, FOR EXAMPLE PHYSICAL CONDITION, DISEASES DETECTED, PHYSCOLOGICAL CONDITION ETC.

Name: COMMENTS, 1-20 CHARACTERS
Explanation: GENERIC COMMENTS, REMARKS OR DESCRIPTIONS UP TO A MAXIMUM OF 20 CHARACTERS.

Name: SURVEILLANCE SYSTEM COMMENTS
Explanation: AMPLIFYING OR SPECIAL INFORMATION ON SYSTEM M DATA FOR THE TRACK BEING REPORTED

Name: WEAPON CONTROL ANCILLARY INFORMATION
Explanation: PROVIDE ANCILLARY INFORMATION FOR WEAPON CONTROL.

Name: LINE 1 COMMENT
Explanation: A SHORT COMMENT IN LINE 1 REGARDING THE ASSOCIATED CONTACT IN MCCIS.

Name: LINE 2 COMMENT
Explanation: A SHORT COMMENT IN LINE 2 REGARDING THE ASSOCIATED CONTACT IN MCCIS.

Name: LINE 3 COMMENT
Explanation: A SHORT COMMENT IN LINE 3 REGARDING THE ASSOCIATED CONTACT IN MCCIS.

Name: LINE 4 COMMENT
Explanation: A SHORT COMMENT IN LINE 4 REGARDING THE ASSOCIATED CONTACT IN MCCIS.
